name: RentHome.ru
overview:
RentHome.ru is an online marketplace of vacation rentals for travellers and devotees of independent tourism across Russia and CIS. The company helps travelers find the right accommodation for their vacations and business trips via an extensive database of private listings and puts the customer in direct contact with owner.

RentHome.ru has a unique market opportunity to capitalize on the growing Russian/CIS travel markets which are characterized by an absence of advanced online travel rentals service.

RentHome.ru offers a much larger and wider selection of accommodations compared to hotels on nightly, weekly and monthly basis. The tenants benefit from finding apartments across all of Russia and CIS and making appropriate reservations without an agent.
RentHome.ru was launched in September 2011 by Fast Lane Ventures.

The companyâ€™s CEO Dwight Linden is an American with over 13 years of executive management business experience in Russia specializing in the internet, telecommunications and tourism sectors. His entrepreneurial business experience has successfully led to him building and launching several companies in Russia from zero. Most recently Dwight was the former CEO of Pososhok.ru (leading Russian Online Travel Agency).

The initial funding of the company was made by Fast Lane Ventures. For more information, please visit www.renthome.ru
